title: More companies move to the South

content.question: Many companies moved their operations from New England and the Midwest to locations in the South because

choices.label: the South had less expensive site factors than northern regions
southern regions had better access to deep water ports
the South had more advantageous relative locations
the southerly climate was an environmental push factor
southern culture was a social pull factor

content.answer: the South had less expensive site factors than northern regions

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain spatial relationships in a specified context or region of the world, using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
